Summary Note:
Lena Renate Schwarz and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Vienna. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Lena Renate Schwarz is a seasoned professional with over 22 years of experience.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Lena Renate Schwarz has been happily married to Gruber since 2012. Their children are named Lena and Mayr.
Education Background:
Lena obtained her secondary school diploma from Musisches Gymnasium Wien in 1997.
After that, she went on to study at IMC University of Applied Sciences Krems until 2001.
In 2006, she received extra education and graduated from Sigmund Freud University Vienna with an additional degree.
Occupation History:
Lena Renate Schwarz is a seasoned professional with over 22 years of experience.
Lena Renate Schwarz's first role was as a Investment Banker at Erste Group Bank AG, where she worked diligently from 2003 to 2006 to establish a strong reputation.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Private Equity Investor at UniCredit Bank Austria AG in 2007, further expanding her skill set.
Her tenure as a Hedge Fund Manager at Oesterreichische Kontrollbank AG from 2011 to 2015 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
After 12 years of dedication, she assumed the role of Venture Capitalist at Raiffeisen Bank International AG in 2017, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
Currently, she serves as a Billionaire Investor at Raiffeisen Bank International AG, continuing to make meaningful contributions to the industry since 2018.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 330000 EUR.
She has townhouse located in Wels, worth 1070000 EUR.

She purchased townhouse in Bregenz, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 970000 EUR.
In 2008, she received an inheritance of 1040000 EUR from her late grandmother, who was a prominent Real Estate Developer, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In summary, Lena has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
